thread.title: Impressed Donald Trump swaps lavish private jet for first trip on Air Force One
thread.title_full: Impressed Donald Trump swaps lavish private jet for first trip on Air Force One

author: Mark Molloy
title: Impressed Donald Trump swaps lavish private jet for first trip on Air Force One
text:
Impressed Donald Trump swaps lavish private jet for first trip on Air Force One US president Donald Trump takes his first trip on Air Force One Credit: AFP/Getty Mark Molloy 27 January 2017 • 10:27am 
D onald Trump is used to flying in style on his own private jet and was suitably impressed as he took his first trip on Air Force One. 
The US president said the modified Boeing 747 was a “great plane” following a 20-minute flight from Washington, DC, to a Republican annual retreat in Philadelphia. Trump boards Air Force One for the first time ... but he failed to look back and wave Credit: AP VIDEO of @Potus in Air Force One office cabin pic.twitter.com/sMzAMNEstF — David Nakamura (@DavidNakamura) January 26, 2017 
“It’s beautiful, a great plane, really beautiful,” he told reporters as he sat in the presidential plane’s office cabin, with a navy blue Air Force One jacket draped over the back of his chair. 
A sked how it compared to his other plane, Trump replied: “That’s a good one too, but this is a very special plane for a lot of reasons.” Trump at his desk on Air Force One Credit: AP Trump with the media Credit: AP 
A merica’s 45 th president then pointed to the Air Force One jacket, commenting: “They just gave me that. Pretty cool jacket, right?” 
Earlier, Trump committed a minor faux pas as he boarded the plane when he forgot to turn around and wave, a longstanding presidential tradition. 
White House correspondent Mark Knoller tweeted: “Pres Trump boards Air Force One, but doesn't turn around to wave - as presidents have done for decades.” 
Another online commentator wrote: “Who cares if @POTUS #Trump didn't give you a fake smile and a wave from Air Force One! The man is working leave him alone…” How Twitter reacted Pres Trump boards Air Force One, but doesn't turn around to wave - as presidents have done for decades. pic.twitter.com/pUOPtB0V0w
